Lowe, Rays hopeful for 'very short' IL stint with left oblique tightness Rays pleased as McClanahan takes 'a great first step' with rehab outing B. Lowe's early exit with side soreness 'very precautionary' More Red Sox Latest Red Sox injuries & transactions Red Sox rookie Dobbins to have season-ending surgery on torn ACL Rafaela caps Boston's 8th straight win with walk-off HR Bregman back from IL as 3B forgoes rehab assignment More Yankees Latest Yankees injuries and transactions Gil begins rehab assignment with strong outing Fried exits with blister on index finger, 'too early to tell' if it will linger Schmidt to undergo Tommy John surgery on Friday More AL Central Guardians Latest Guardians injuries and transactions Thomas' nagging plantar fasciitis leads to 3rd IL stint of '25 Bieber throws 'really encouraging' live BP; rehab start could come soon Arias placed on IL; Rocchio back in the Majors More Royals Latest Royals injuries & transactions Massey's rehab hits a snag following HBP, illness Wright out for at least 2 weeks with left oblique strain Marsh, Wright face setbacks in recovery process More Tigers Latest Tigers injuries and transactions Torres avoids serious injury after scary collision on basepaths Carpenter (hamstring), Gipson-Long (neck) placed on IL Olson nearing return to Tigers' rotation after successful rehab start More Twins Correa (right ankle sprain) collects two hits in first game back Latest Twins injuries & transactions Correa diagnosed with mild ankle sprain after scary play Buxton exits with left hand contusion, X-rays come back negative More White Sox Latest White Sox injuries & transactions White Sox place Robert on IL with left hamstring strain White Sox bring in Altavilla with Castro (knee) out for season White Sox place Benintendi on IL with left calf strain More AL West Angels Latest Angels injuries & transactions Strickland lands on 60-day IL (shoulder strain), avoids surgery Moncada returns to Halos after 5-week absence; Braves hopeful for September return More Marlins Latest Marlins injuries & transactions Cabrera undergoes MRI on sore right elbow 'Really frustrating': Meyer looks ahead after season-ending hip surgery Weathers placed on 60-day IL with left lat strain More Mets Latest Mets injuries & transactions Mets reliever Núñez scheduled for Tommy John surgery Winker (back inflammation) returns to IL, will receive medication treatment Winker forced from game with back tightness, will undergo MRI More Nationals Latest Nationals injuries & transactions What's the Nationals plan with Williams, Ruiz injured?
